author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Got a zero on two labs when I’m not even added to a lab section yet
question:
Hi,

I don’t know where else to put this but I checked canvas and I got zero for my first and second lab. I haven’t been added to a lab section yet so I’ve been doing the labs on my own. I thought these labs would be omitted but I got a zero on them?? I am really freaking out right now because I also got a 75 on pset one. I did everything in my own time with the autograder giving me 100 on everything. I’ve also been trying to get into a lab section for three weeks now, and even emailed for a follow up update but I haven’t heard a single thing yet about being added to labs. I did what I was supposed to stand at 25%???
student_answer: Are you not able to register? There are lab sections open right now on the SSC
instructor_answer:
@253, and please review the syllabus.
Edit: You are registered in L2T, please monitor your registration status on a daily basis.
